title: Instant Pot® Butternut Squash Soup with Coconut Milk

Ingredients.1: 1 large butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks

Ingredients.3: 2 (2 inch) pieces peeled turmeric, finely grated

Ingredients.6: 1 cup chicken stock, or as needed

Ingredients.7: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Combine butternut squash, water, turmeric, and ginger in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®). Close and lock the lid. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 8 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.

Directions.2: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. Pour in coconut milk. Using an immersion blender, blend soup until smooth.

Directions.3: Select Saute function. Gradually add chicken stock until desired consistency is reached. Season with salt and pepper.
